ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit Includes Some Of The Essential Accessories You Need To Take Full Advantage Of Your New Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX200V Digital Camera
Deluxe Hard Shell Case, Revolutionary Design, Durable hard Shell Construction, Adjustable Shoulder Strap, Holds Digital Camcoder and Accessories, Inner Dimensions: L 5.5 x W 4.5 x H 3.5 inch
Hi Capacity Lithium 1000MAH Replacement extended Battery For Sony NP-FH50 + 110/220 Ac/Dc Rapid Travel Charger For Sony NP-FH50
50 Inch Professional Photo Video Tripod- 3-Way Pan head, Rapid-Action Locks Legs, Built In Bubble Leveling, Quick release Platform, Rubber feet, includes Carrying Case
(6FT) HDMI Male to Mini HDMI - Connect Your Camera / Camcorder Directly To Your HDTV + Deluxe Universal 5 LCD Screen Protectors + More
ProductInfo.Name: Advanced Accessory Kit For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX200V Digital Camera Includes Extended (1000mAh) Replacement NP-FH50 Battery + Ac/Dc Travel Charger + Deluxe Case + Mini HDMI Cable + 57 Tripod + 67 Monopod + USB Card Reader + Screen Protectors + More
